,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;207, 649E, 421;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85402;SKY85402, 342HR, 1342 MY;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = RT5100W |manuf_rev = -D61 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/10/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B018WJVKOK |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RT5100W-D61(RoHS) REV:3" is silkscreened on the main board. :OEM: [[Askey]] RT5100W (Model Part Num: 90IG01H0-BM3000) "WWLC040-D61-EU REV:3A" is silkscreened on the modem board. ===Additional specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1200'' (300Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 867Mbps [5 GHz]) * Antennas: 1x external LTE antenna (fixed) :2x external dipole antenna w/ RP-SMA connector * Ports: USB: 1x ''USB 2.0'' : Ethernet: 1x WAN (GbE), 4x LAN (GbE) * Power Supply: : AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output: 19V with max. 1.75A current ===CPU Info=== {{SCollapse|cpuinfo |
admin@4G-AC55U:/# uname -a
Linux 4G-AC55U 3.3.8 #67 Tue Jan 6 14:11:03 CST 2015 mips GNU/Linux
